cu.explanation_en: Setting the transport preference to an invalid enum value 'invalid' will cause transport layer configuration errors and prevent proper F1 interface setup.

du.explanation_en: Setting the SSB periodicity to an invalid value of 99 will cause synchronization signal broadcast errors and prevent UE cell search and selection.
du.explanation_zh: 將 SSB 週期設定為無效值 99 會導致同步信號廣播錯誤，並阻止 UE 細胞搜尋和選擇。
